text: The 2017 West Coast Conference Women's Basketball Tournament was the postseason women's basketball tournament for the West Coast Conference for the 2017–18 season. All tournament games were played at the Orleans Arena in the Las Vegas-area community of Paradise, Nevada from March 2–6, 2018. Regular- season champion Gonzaga won the tournament and with it the WCC's automatic berth in the NCAA Tournament. ==Seeds== WCC tiebreaker procedures went as follows: # Head-to-head # Record against the top-seeded team(s) not involved in the tie, going down through the seedings as needed # Higher RPI {| class="wikitable" style="white-space:nowrap; font-size:95%;text-align:center" !Seed !School
